description: hard gray case with gray impressed sketch on cover; contains 14 loose prints rendered in sketchy style; each is signed and dated; lender's archive #40
markings: Numbered in pencil on each sheet: 1/12
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed in pencil on each print, LRC: Till Verclas 07
title: Der Aufstieg (The Ascent)
